page.title: 04LIFEBOAT DAY
page.content: This event is to raise money for the lifeboat. Porthleven no longer has its own lifeboat but the one from Newlyn comes to the harbour each year and you are allowed on it. There are stalls on the harbour head selling lifeboat souvenirs and there are games like tombola. There are swimming races, boat races and a raft race, a greasy pole, bicycle riding on a tight rope and a mop fight when people in boats try to knock each other out of their boats using wet mops. The helicopter from R.N.A.S. Culdrose gives a rescue display and there is a fancy dress competition for children. People dressed as pirates and clowns go around with collecting boxes and there is also a raffle.
